name: YouTube Video Cutter
description: Cuts or downloads YouTube videos. Allows specifying start/end times or downloading the full video.

preferences.name: YouTube Cutter Keyword
preferences.description: Keyword to trigger YouTube cutter. Use '<keyword> <url> <start> <end>' to cut or '<keyword> <url> full' to download the full video.

preferences.name: Output Directory
preferences.description: Directory to save cut videos. Use '~' for home directory (e.g., ~/Videos/Cuts).

preferences.name: Auto-open Output Directory
preferences.description: Automatically open the output directory after cutting a video.
